languages.text: "Также я весьма наслышан о вашем {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}незаурядном интеллекте{/d}, а вернее о весьма впечатляющих результатах, которых вы достигли с его помощью. Мне всегда импонировали люди, способные сокрушить врага или обрести могучего союзника парой тщательно подобранных фраз и грамотных поручений". {n}Уголки губ Владайма едва заметно вздергиваются вверх, опасно приблизив выражение лица Наместника к тени искренней улыбки.{/n}

"I've heard much about your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}rare acumen{/d} — or I should say, about the profoundly impressive results you managed to achieve by using it. I have always had a fondness for individuals who can destroy their enemy or gain a powerful ally with just a few well phrased sentences or precisely issued orders." {n}The corners of Vladaym's mouth twitch, bringing his expression dangerously close to a genuine smile.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Также я весьма наслышан о вашем {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}незаурядном интеллекте{/d}, а вернее о весьма впечатляющих результатах, которых вы достигли с его помощью. Мне всегда импонировали люди, способные сокрушить врага или обрести могучего союзника парой тщательно подобранных фраз и грамотных поручений". {n}Уголки губ Владайма едва заметно вздергиваются вверх, опасно приблизив выражение лица Наместника к тени искренней улыбки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I've heard much about your rare acumen — or I should say, about the profoundly impressive results you managed to achieve by using it. I have always had a fondness for individuals who can destroy their enemy or gain a powerful ally with just a couple of well phrased sentences or precisely issued orders." {n}The corners of Vladaym's mouth twitch, bringing his expression dangerously close to a shadow of a genuine smile.{/n}

I have always had a fondness for individuals who can destroy their enemy or gain a powerful ally with just a couple of well phrased sentences or precisely issued orders." {n}The corners of Vladaym's mouth twitch, bringing his expression dangerously close to a shadow of a genuine smile.{/n}

I have always had a fondness for individuals who can destroy their enemy or gain a powerful ally with just a few well phrased sentences or precisely issued orders." {n}The corners of Vladaym's mouth twitch, bringing his expression dangerously close to a genuine smile.{/n}

I have always had a fondness for individuals who can destroy their enemy or gain a powerful ally with just a few well phrased sentences or precisely issued orders." {n}The corners of Vladaym's mouth twitch, bringing his expression dangerously close to a genuine smile.{/n}

I have always had a fondness for individuals who can destroy their enemy or gain a powerful ally with just a few well phrased sentences or precisely issued orders." {n}The corners of Vladaym's mouth twitch, bringing his expression dangerously close to a genuine smile.{/n}

languages.text: “我听说过很多关于您的事情，您的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}聪明才智世所罕见{/d}。或者我应该说，您利用你的聪明才智，取得了令人钦佩不已的成果。我一直很喜欢这样的人，他们只要靠几句措辞得体的言谈或恰到好处的命令，就可以消灭敌人，或是获得强大的盟友。”{n}弗拉迪姆的嘴角抽搐着，脸上表情看起来就像是在发自内心地微笑一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I've heard much about your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}rare acumen{/d} — or I should say, about the profoundly impressive results you managed to achieve by using it. I have always had a fondness for individuals who can destroy their enemy or gain a powerful ally with just a few well phrased sentences or precisely issued orders." {n}The corners of Vladaym's mouth twitch, bringing his expression dangerously close to a genuine smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我听说过很多关于您的事情，您的聪明才智世所罕见。或者我应该说，您利用你的聪明才智，取得了令人钦佩不已的成果。我一直很喜欢这样的人，他们只要靠几句措辞得体的言谈或恰到好处的命令，就可以消灭敌人，或是获得强大的盟友。”{n}弗拉迪姆的嘴角抽搐着，脸上表情看起来就像是在发自内心地微笑一样。{/n}

languages.text: "Ich habe so viel von Eurem {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}seltenen Scharfsinn{/d} gehört – oder sollte ich sagen, von den ungeheuer beeindruckenden Ergebnissen, die Ihr durch ihn erreichen konntet. Ich hatte schon immer eine Schwäche für alle, die mit nur wenigen gut formulierten Sätzen oder präzise erteilten Befehlen ihren Feind zerstören oder einen mächtigen Verbündeten gewinnen können." {n}Vladayms Mundwinkel zucken, was seine Miene einem echten Lächeln gefährlich nah bringt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I've heard much about your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}rare acumen{/d} — or I should say, about the profoundly impressive results you managed to achieve by using it. I have always had a fondness for individuals who can destroy their enemy or gain a powerful ally with just a few well phrased sentences or precisely issued orders." {n}The corners of Vladaym's mouth twitch, bringing his expression dangerously close to a genuine smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe so viel von Eurem seltenen Scharfsinn gehört — oder sollte ich sagen, von den ungeheuer beeindruckenden Ergebnissen, die Ihr durch ihn erreichen konntet. Ich hatte schon immer eine Schwäche für alle, die mit nur wenigen gut formulierten Sätzen oder präzise erteilten Befehlen ihren Feind zerstören oder einen mächtigen Verbündeten gewinnen können." {n}Vladayms Mundwinkel zucken, was seine Miene einem echten Lächeln gefährlich nah bringt.{/n}

languages.text: « J'ai beaucoup entendu parler de votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}perspicacité hors du commun{/d}... ou plutôt, des résultats impressionnants que vous êtes {mf|parvenu|parvenue} à obtenir en l'exploitant à bon escient. J'ai toujours admiré les individus capables d'anéantir leurs ennemis ou de gagner un puissant allié simplement avec quelques phrases bien tournées. » {n}Les commissures des lèvres de Vladaym tressautent, métamorphosant son expression en quelque chose qui ressemble vaguement à un sourire sincère.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I've heard much about your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}rare acumen{/d} — or I should say, about the profoundly impressive results you managed to achieve by using it. I have always had a fondness for individuals who can destroy their enemy or gain a powerful ally with just a few well phrased sentences or precisely issued orders." {n}The corners of Vladaym's mouth twitch, bringing his expression dangerously close to a genuine smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « J'ai beaucoup entendu parler de votre perspicacité hors du commun... ou plutôt, des résultats impressionnants que vous êtes {mf|parvenu|parvenue} à obtenir en l'exploitant à bon escient. J'ai toujours admiré les individus capables d'anéantir leurs ennemis ou de gagner un puissant allié simplement avec quelques phrases bien tournées. » {n}Les commissures des lèvres de Vladaym tressautent, métamorphosant son expression en quelque chose qui ressemble vaguement à un sourire sincère.{/n}

languages.text: «He oído hablar de su {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}singular ingenio{/d}, o, mejor dicho, de los fantásticos resultados que ha logrado obtener gracias a él. Siempre he valorado a la gente capaz de destruir a un enemigo o ganarse a un aliado con un par de frases u órdenes precisas». {n}Las comisuras de Vladaym se retuercen, acercándose peligrosamente a una sonrisa sincera.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I've heard much about your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}rare acumen{/d} — or I should say, about the profoundly impressive results you managed to achieve by using it. I have always had a fondness for individuals who can destroy their enemy or gain a powerful ally with just a few well phrased sentences or precisely issued orders." {n}The corners of Vladaym's mouth twitch, bringing his expression dangerously close to a genuine smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «He oído hablar de su singular ingenio, o, mejor dicho, de los fantásticos resultados que ha logrado obtener gracias a él. Siempre he valorado a la gente capaz de destruir a un enemigo o ganarse a un aliado con un par de frases u órdenes precisas». {n}Las comisuras de Vladaym se retuercen, acercándose peligrosamente a una sonrisa sincera.{/n}

languages.text: 「君の{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}稀有な洞察力{/d}についてはよく聞いている。それともその洞察力による素晴らしい結果の数々を述べるべきか。私は、ちょっとした言い回しや的確な命令で敵を滅ぼしたり、強力な味方を得たりできるような人物が好きでね」{n}ヴラダイムは口角を上げ、まるで本物の笑みに近づくかのような表情を見せる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I've heard much about your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}rare acumen{/d} — or I should say, about the profoundly impressive results you managed to achieve by using it. I have always had a fondness for individuals who can destroy their enemy or gain a powerful ally with just a few well phrased sentences or precisely issued orders." {n}The corners of Vladaym's mouth twitch, bringing his expression dangerously close to a genuine smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「君の{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}稀有な洞察力{/d}についてはよく聞いている。それともその洞察力による素晴らしい結果の数々を述べるべきか。私は、ちょっとした言い回しや的確な命令で敵を滅ぼしたり、強力な味方を得たりできるような人物が好きでね」{n}ヴラダイムは口角を上げ、まるで本物の笑みに近づくかのような表情を見せる。{/n}

languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}Olağanüstü zekânız{/d}, daha doğrusu zekânız sayesinde elde etmeyi başardığınız son derece etkileyici sonuçlara dair çok şey işittim. Yalnızca iyi ifade edilmiş cümleler ya da doğru emirlerle düşmanlarını yok edebilecek veya güçlü müttefikler kazanabilecek kişilere karşı her daim hayranlık beslemişimdir." {n}Vladaym'ın dudağının kenarı seğirip suratındaki ifade, samimi bir gülümsemenin kıyısından dönüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I've heard much about your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}rare acumen{/d} — or I should say, about the profoundly impressive results you managed to achieve by using it. I have always had a fondness for individuals who can destroy their enemy or gain a powerful ally with just a few well phrased sentences or precisely issued orders." {n}The corners of Vladaym's mouth twitch, bringing his expression dangerously close to a genuine smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Olağanüstü zekânız, daha doğrusu sayesinde elde etmeyi başardığınız son derece etkileyici sonuçlar hakkında çok şey duydum. Yalnızca iyi ifade edilmiş cümleler veya kesin emirlerle düşmanlarını yok edebilecek veya güçlü bir müttefik kazanabilecek bireylere karşı her zaman bir düşkünlüğüm olmuştur." {n}Vladaym'ın dudağının kenarı seğirince ifadesi tehlikeli bir şekilde samimi bir gülümsemeye döner gibi oluyor.{/n}
